name: Escuela Intercontinental de Aviación
about: Escuela Intercontinental de Aviación, or Intercontinental College of Aviation, is a renowned aviation training institution based in Lagos, Nigeria. Recognized internationally for its high standards in pilot training, ICA offers a diverse range of programs catering to all levels of flying interests, from beginner to advanced levels. Our team of full-time, dedicated instructors boasts extensive experience in airline, air force, and charter flying, ensuring exceptional standards of instruction and a strong rapport with students. Our mission is to consistently exceed client expectations while leading the flight industry in Africa and being recognized worldwide as a formal aviation training organization and commercial charter operation. We are committed to providing professional training for domestic and international students, whether for a career or a hobby, ensuring optimum results every time.
services: ["Cabin Crew Program TCP\nCommercial Aircraft Pilot Ground Program PCA\nDPA Aircraft Dispatcher Program"]
